locations.name: Church
locations.description: You are in a church filled with wooden pews and an altar and nothing else. The window you entered by is to the north. There is a wooden door to the south.

locations.name: Courtyard
locations.description: The courtyard is an open area surrounded by tall stone walls. To the north is a door that leads to the church. To the south is a door to a tall watchtower. To the west are grand doors leading to the great hall.

locations.name: Watchtower
locations.description: The WatchTower is a small room with a table, a chair, and a guard asleep slumped over the table. A KEY rests on the table next to his right hand. To your north is the door that leads to the courtyard. There is a NOTE on the table as well. There are narrow stairs that lead up to armory and stairs that lead down to a dungeon.

locations.name: Armory
locations.description: The Armory is a small room contains many weapons: SWORDS, MACES, HALBERDS, the tools of the king’s guard. There is also a spare TUNIC that the guards wear. It has the INSIGNIA of the king.

locations.name: Dungeon
locations.description: The Dungeon is gloomy, cold and dripping water.  Shackles dangle from the walls. In one of the cells huddles a bloodied PRISONER.

locations.name: Great Hall
locations.description: The Great Hall ceiling is 20 feet high. Light pours in from big windows on each side of the room. To the north is a door leading to the wizard’s tower. However, explore the other rooms since you need important items to defeat the evil wizard.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: The Kitchen has a few servants scrub pots, dishes, and the floor. The light from the large open hearth partially illuminates the room. On a table there is a KNIFE and in the corner there is a bottle labeled POISON that is usually used to kill rats.

locations.name: Royal Lounge
locations.description: The Royal Lounge has a few couches, a table surrounded with chairs. This room is usually used for important meetings with the king. In this room you will find a key that open the door to the Wizard’s Tower.

locations.name: Royal Library
locations.description: The Library has shelves of books cover the walls from floor to ceiling. There are cushioned chairs and a table near the center of the room. At this table sits a tall gangly figure with a long white beard is seated in a chair, engrossed in a giant magical tome

locations.name: King’s Chambers
locations.description: The King’s Chambers is off limits.

locations.name: Wizard's Foyer
locations.description: The Wizards Foyer is a wide large dimly lit room. As you enter you hear strange snorts and snarls. It’s a 10-foot, dragon-scaled, lion-headed chimera with what looks to be bat wings sprawling what must be 30 feet across, claws as sharp as daggers, a tail with the head of a serpent and venom dripping from its vampire fangs. A truly grotesque twisting of the natural world by the dark forces lurking nearby. Luckily, this thing appears to be sleeping.

locations.name: Wizard’s Chambers
locations.description: The Wizards Bedroom has a 4-post bed covered by a dark quilt. You see a table and chair. Sitting on the chair, looking at you, is the WIZARD.

locations.name: Laboratory
locations.description: The Laboratory is full of tables crammed with beakers and vials filled with colorful, bubbling and smoking liquids. You see a jug of MEAD on one of the tables. There is a NOTE next to the MEAD.
